Week 9 update of the moving average of offensive epa.I have lowered the window size to 65 plays as this is the average number of offensive plays per game excluding special teams plays (they were included in the 75 play window size in the first version of the chart)
data:#nflverse https://t.co/wnfkseI1F9

Here's the EPA/Play by Play Type for each QB halfway through the 2021 season! We can see who relies more on what to get to their current production. Jameis & Hurts getting a lot of value from scrambling, Rodgers from penalties, Tanny from runs, Teddy B...just ballin'? #nflverse https://t.co/rk3xx6xeS5

Yesterday Lamar particularly struggled on 3rd down. He is bottom #7 in 3rd downs all season, in spite of being top #7 in early downs! A struggle that Baker Mayfield and Russell Wilson know even more... #nflverse https://t.co/IYkGd0xDco

With Odell Beckham's release imminent, let's take a look at how spending big on WRs impacts team success. 

Super Bowl winners generally have middle of the pack spending. And in 2020, WR spending had no impact on team wins.

data: #nflverse #overthecap
idea: @JJ31030379 https://t.co/UAyK1voEfa

🚨Introducing the NFL Patrick Beverley Awards🚨
 
These prestigious honors go to the players who have been "running around, doing nothing" this season.
 
QBs: High time to throw, low avg target depth
WRs: Lots of routes run, low targets
RBs: Lots of carries, low yards
#nflverse https://t.co/YBQjYj618l

Sorry for the few-week hiatus, been pretty busy, but I'm back with some RB clusters for week 9! Cluster labels:
#1 The quintessential backup RBs
#2 The Bellcows
#3 Shifty in space
#4 The runners that should see more attempts
#5 The pass-catchers

Though it's a small sample size, Goff does seem to be getting sacked a tad deeper than usual. Discussion point among Lions' fans about how much the o-line (esp. tackles) is to blame, particularly with deep dropbacks. @PrideOfDetroit #nflverse https://t.co/HCO7MS3zwO

このhashtagは、現地のNFLガチ勢が独自で算出したデータを提供してあるのだが、また興味深いデータが見つかったので紹介したい

今シーズンの各チームQBの投げるまでの時間と一投あたり稼ぐ距離の相関関係を出している
縦軸が一投平均での獲得yard、横軸が一投平均のthrow Time
#nfljapan https://t.co/uCHimvsh4P

右上はイメージ通りの曲芸師系QBが集まっている
この右上に分布しているQBがマホームズと同じようなD#対策されたら有効なのか？その可能性は高いが、是非ともやってほしい
と思う

ロジャースとLoveくん、実は長いパスよりもスクリメージラインより手前の至近距離のパスで違いが大きいというデータなんて、どう言う問題が起きてるのか気になりすぎる #nfljapan

Where might we expect Najee and the #Steelers to target when it comes to running the ball? #Bears are averaging giving up 125 rushing yards per game, good for 24th in the league. Teams have found most success through the end gap, averaging a whopping .496 EPA per run. #nflverse https://t.co/IZ7RznX7nT

James Conner continues his tear for the #Cardinals after a monster week, leading the league in Mean YAC. 
#WeeklyMeanYACReport #nflverse https://t.co/mUpBz7K55J

Looking at difficulty of a QB’s pass attempts using two axes:

Situation (how easy was it for defense to predict a pass?)

Throw (how many air yards and from what location, down, & distance on the field?)

What has been the net effect of penalties on each team in 2021?

The Browns have been hurt the most by penalties this year, losing a net of 3.5 EPA per game on penalties called in their games.

Epa/play for Off/Def with split score diff. and some stuffs on time. 
Chiefs's off leading by 2 scoring for just 12 minutes. Cardinals, Bills, Cowboys  Defense was never been in trailing by 2 scoring.
Lions's Off. is the only team has never been in leading by 2 scoring #nflverse https://t.co/1XcHf5acL3

Offense Playing Time
Cardinals, Bills, Chargers have played most time leading by 2 possession. WFT, Jets, Lions Offense have never played leading by 2 possession.
Browns have played most time in close game.
Bengals played just 21 plays trailing by 2 possession.
